Reviews.Title: “worse service ever”

Reviews.Content: never bad experience recent stay comfort inn aurrora seattle everything fine always chain woke morning find toilet clogged… called front desk guy said “ ooo right house keeping yet … ” surely past 8am maybe even 9 said “ ok urgent right going breakfast able take care time back ” “ sure ” promise well sure enough returned find clogged toilet answer front desk went lady found front desk housekeeping said leave front desk “ use another room bathroom ” “ room clean mess another room… ” apparently produced plunger hand saying “ anyone right ” ……… minute later knock door house keeping apparently toilet hoping gone could clean room asked look toilet tried use plunger eventually got thing messier left… upon checking told guy front desk disappointed complained even let u use another room bathroom surprised said “ room booked spare room ” … even offer apology apparently shot sharp look mumbled “ sorry ” … day husband used lobby bathroom use brushed teeth bottle next car… ok got make long story short morning toilet clogged send anyone repair though kind enough hand plunger let use another room bathroom top rude interesting 1 rare occasion receive request useualy choice comfort inn fill survey hotel soon stay theyn nearly always send this… written choice make complain however never received respond all…

Reviews.Title: “Good value in North Seattle”
Reviews.Author: Robert A
Reviews.Content: stayed business trip great location nice room friendly staff great continental breakfast close many attraction area northgate mall pike place market downtown seattle con room really thin wall could hear people talking room hallway also could access free wifi room lobby

Reviews.Title: “Average property in average location, kitchen room GREAT value”
Reviews.Author: Snert3
Reviews.Content: stayed business trip downtown seattle next morning 10 fortunately know seattle traffic budgeted 45 minute 10 mile trip needed every minute room freshly painted clean though bedding seen better day upgraded kitchenette room attention extended stay traveler kitchenette fullsize regular kitchen breakfast usual unremarkable comfort inn processed food offering tourist know property located busy commercial street thats basically stripmall heaven scenic youll drive take public transit see seattle attraction still price good deal

Reviews.Title: “Hello Value! Hello Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: thinkbird
Reviews.Content: stayed wife loved got ta try citizen coffee shop corner good stuff good location 5 10 minute drive pike place great location everything right seattle needle looking great place eat night try 5 spot literally die man many good place eat like salumis italian meat beecher world best mac cheese seriously duke chowder house pike place quinns amazing place eat wild boar sloppy joes also seattle great short 2 hour drive vancouver canada 2 hour drive portland oregon

Reviews.Title: “Will NEVER stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: motomom188
Reviews.Content: experience comfort inn suite aurora ave seattle wa horrible booked hotel expedia chose hotel traveling pet pet friendly checked hotel dennis hotel manager rude realize pet tried charge u additional 2500 day expedia told u 1500 per day believed already paid expedia argured u impatience helping u understand charged long debate ended charging u 1500 tax pet got room dirty pull sofa dirty sheet hair inside bed huge pee stain mattress called clean bedding recieve till 11pm evening waited hour point calling dennis 3 time finally delivered clean bedding room available stay dirty room compromised inconvience ever never ever stay good luck unaware entire hotel staff rude continental breakfast average

Reviews.Title: “A room of requirement”
Reviews.Author: suetripper
Reviews.Content: visiting friend shoreline area downtown require trendiness cleanliness convenience hotel aurora ave fit bill nicely nothing extraordinary good value clean good breakfast quiet safe one niggle hot tub new chemical put nobody make usable

Reviews.Title: “Good comfortable choice”
Reviews.Author: snoopy647
Reviews.Content: stayed one night march 2011 wanted hotel stay 100 handy location close northgate mall arrived upgraded u 1 bedroom suite roomy enjoyable front desk clerk pleasant close outback dinner comfortable bed room located back hotel main street quiet location notice early morning people walking around room u hear noise far guest talking others noticed

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: PinkSoxusa
Reviews.Content: downtown seattle expensive place stay husband found hotel 80 plus tax two queen bed free wireless adequate breakfast included egg waffle service quick courteous arrived assigned room loud female laughter coming adjoining room quick visit front desk secured u quiet room without problem room clean linen good quality pleased find clean quiet room downtown seattle reasonable price highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Ummmm......u get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: tjprince
Reviews.Content: one night layover due bad weather flight delayed got distress rate room 55 expecting much kept u warm bed bad either seem clean and/or maintained 9 hour total say much first shuttle driver pretty rude guy second day much nicer staff check friendly
